name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When Is Lunch: A Simple Schedule Timer

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When Is Lunch is a simple and helpful chrome extension for school/work schedules.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
WhenIsLunch is a simple and helpful site that allows users to track their schedules with realtime countdowns. 

Wondering how much time is left in your schedule? Enter your schedule here and get customized results each time you load the page!

This extension is made to help you manage your schedule, whether you're in school or at work! Once you set your schedule, you'll be able to refresh the page without it being reset (as long as you don't clear your cache).
